ch0115_00_denji/0101_0701_02_10:
I know you’re no stranger to rousing adventure.
Enjoy yourself out there.
ch0115_00_denji/0601_0701_01_10:
I was invited to join the Elite Four once when I
was in Sinnoh, but I had to turn them down.
ch0115_00_denji/0601_0701_02_10:
They told me in no uncertain terms that I couldn’t
renovate the Pokémon League building, so I
lost interest.
ch0115_00_denji/0601_0701_03_10:
Well, no, I just thought that I’d rather be a Gym
Leader where I could meet ordinary folks.
ch0115_00_denji/0602_0701_01_10:
Pasio is an artificial island. The environments here,
like the forests, volcanoes, and glaciers, are all
maintained by machines.
ch0115_00_denji/0602_0701_02_10:
But what kind of machines? And how exactly do
they work? I’m so curious...
ch0115_00_denji/0602_0701_03_10:
Aren’t you curious, too? I just can’t stop thinking
about it.
ch0115_00_denji/0603_0701_01_10:
The roads in Sunyshore City, where my Gym is
located, are actually solar panels.
ch0115_00_denji/0603_0701_03_10:
That gives us plenty of electricity to use and makes
it a great place to live. I’d definitely recommend it
if you’re thinking about moving somewhere!
ch0115_00_denji/0604_0701_01_10:
Do you and your partner Pokémon have a special
move you can use as your trump card?
ch0115_00_denji/0604_0701_02_10:
You know, something extra special to keep in
reserve until the time is right.
ch0115_00_denji/0604_0701_03_10:
If not, you should definitely come up with one. I’m
looking forward to seeing what electrifying move
you call your trump card!
ch0115_00_denji/0605_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Do you have
any moves that hold a special place in your heart?
Maybe one you just really like?
ch0115_00_denji/0605_0701_02_10:
When I got my first Gym Badge, I used the
move Thunderbolt.
ch0115_00_denji/0605_0701_03_10:
I’ll never forget the electrifying sensation I felt at
that moment—or the joy it sparked in my heart.
ch0115_00_denji/1701_0701_02_10: I wanted you to have this.
ch0115_00_denji/1701_0702_01_10: Put it to use however you see fit.
ch0115_00_denji/1701_0702_02_10:
The stronger you get as a Trainer, the happier I’ll
be to battle you!
ch0115_00_denji/2501_0701_01_10:
What do you think about the machines here on
Pasio? They’re interesting, huh?
ch0115_00_denji/2501_0701_02_10:
Soon after I arrived here, I found an unusual
machine in town. I tried to do some renovations
to it...
ch0115_00_denji/2501_0701_03_10:
but that caused a partial power outage. I got
quite an earful from the PML staff afterward.
ch0115_00_denji/2501_0701_04_10:
But to tell you the truth, seeing how mad they got
about it just made me even more curious about the
kinds of machines they have here.
ch0115_00_denji/2501_0702_01_10:
I used to renovate my Gym all the time back
in Sinnoh.
ch0115_00_denji/2501_0702_02_10:
I ended up using so much electricity that it
caused blackouts all over the city. I got so
many complaints...
ch0115_00_denji/2511_0701_01_10: Do you know Flint? He’s one of Sinnoh’s Elite Four.
ch0115_00_denji/2511_0701_02_10:
Somehow we always seem to wind up doing
stuff together, almost like we’re stuck with each
other, for better or worse.
ch0115_00_denji/2511_0701_03_10:
Don’t get me wrong—he’s a good guy. Maybe a
bit too fired up for my taste, but don’t let that
turn you off about him.
ch0115_00_denji/2511_0702_01_10:
Flint’s a good guy, but sometimes he does the
strangest things.
ch0115_00_denji/2511_0702_02_10:
Recently, he tried to challenge me to a Pokémon
battle inside the villa! I swear, that guy can be
really irresponsible sometimes.
ch0115_00_denji/3001_0701_01_10:
What’s the matter? Still sleepy? Then how about a
battle? That ought to shock you wide awake!
ch0115_00_denji/3003_0701_01_10:
I wonder how they built Pasio...
And how do they keep everything running?
ch0115_00_denji/3005_0701_01_10:
Be careful not to waste electricity at night. 
We can get in a lot of trouble if we cause
an outage.
